scripts.start: concurrently -n react,flask "react-scripts start" "cd server && nodemon --ext py --exec python3 flask_app.py"
scripts.build: react-scripts build && rm -rf deploy && mkdir deploy && cp -r server/ deploy && mv build deploy/static
scripts.deploy: cd deploy/ && rm -rf .git && git init && git add -A && git commit -m "init" && git remote add dokku dokku@apps.cs61a.org:cats && git push --force dokku master
